data.comment: The match has started at Saputo Stadium.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 2, Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In Montreal Toronto drive forward through Jonathan Osorio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 7, Pablo Piatti of Toronto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
Goal kick for Montreal at Saputo Stadium.
In the minute 10, Montreal attack but Saphir Taider's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Toronto at Saputo Stadium.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Toronto needs to be cautious. Montreal have an attacking throw-in.
Dave Gantar awards Toronto a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Toronto are whistled for offside.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
Montreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Can Toronto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the home team in Montreal.
Toronto drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
Free kick Toronto.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Toronto at Saputo Stadium.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Dave Gantar signals a Toronto throw-in in Montreal's half.
In the minute 29, In Montreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jozy Altidore (Toronto) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 32, Toronto take a 0-1 lead thanks to Pablo Piatti.
Richie Laryea with an assist there.
Montreal are caught offside.
In the minute 36, Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Montreal.
Dave Gantar awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Montreal in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 39, Montreal are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Montreal pushes forward through Romell Quioto, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 41, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of Montreal.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
In Montreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
In the minute 47, Throw-in high up the field for Montreal in Montreal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montreal.
Toronto drives forward and Jozy Altidore gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 51, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Montreal just outside Toronto's area.
In the minute 57, Victor Wanyama (Montreal) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Saputo Stadium.
Throw-in for Toronto at Saputo Stadium.
Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 65, Dave Gantar signals a Toronto throw-in in Montreal's half.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Toronto.
Dave Gantar awards Toronto a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Greg Vanney is making the team's first substitution at Saputo Stadium with Nick DeLeon replacing Richie Laryea.
Montreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Free kick Toronto.
Toronto are pushing forward but Alejandro Pozuelo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the home team in Montreal.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
In the minute 75, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
Jozy Altidore (Toronto) strikes at Saputo Stadium but his header is cleared.
Dave Gantar blows against Montreal's Romell Quioto for offside.
In the minute 80, Orji Okwonkwo is on a sub for Lassi Lappalainen for Montreal.
Toronto make their second substitution with Ayo Akinola replacing Pablo Piatti.
Toronto's Jozy Altidore gets in a shot on goal at Saputo Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, Toronto drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Dave Gantar awards the away team a throw-in.
Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 89, Goal! Jozy Altidore gives Toronto a 1-2 lead.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Toronto at Saputo Stadium.
Montreal advance rapidly upfield but Dave Gantar blows for offside.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Tsubasa Endoh is replacing Jozy Altidore for Toronto at Saputo Stadium.
The away team have replaced Alejandro Pozuelo with Eriq Zavaleta. This is the third substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
Anthony Jackson-Hamel is replacing Samuel Piette for the home team.
